name: WKDownloadDelegate
desc: A protocol you implement to track download progress and handle redirects, authentication challenges, and failures.

items.name: func download(WKDownload, decideDestinationUsing: URLResponse, suggestedFilename: String, completionHandler: (URL?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to provide a file destination where the system should write the download data.

items.name: func downloadDidFinish(WKDownload)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the download finished.

items.name: func download(WKDownload, didFailWithError: Error, resumeData: Data?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the download failed, with error information and data you can use to restart the download.

items.name: func download(WKDownload, didReceive: URLAuthenticationChallenge, completionHandler: (URLSession.AuthChallengeDisposition, URLCredential?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to respond to an authentication challenge.

items.name: enum WKDownload.RedirectPolicy
items.desc: An enumeration with cases that indicate whether to proceed with a redirect.

items.name: func download(WKDownload, willPerformHTTPRedirection: HTTPURLResponse, newRequest: URLRequest, decisionHandler: (WKDownload.RedirectPolicy) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to respond to the downloadâ€™s redirect response.

items.name: enum WKDownload.RedirectPolicy
items.desc: An enumeration with cases that indicate whether to proceed with a redirect.
